TopicTitle: Reverting to launch breaks game - only skybox and GUI visible

Articles.Content:
Reverting to launch or VAB from an active ship often causes the game to do this:

![Ff0zKG9.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ff0zKG9.png)

[ksp.log](https://mega.co.nz/#!8MBQ3BYA!DC7fwAxGhpfVB0gj9xD4vTKlAQ9kXACaa6pnMnzbAw0)

[Modlist](https://mega.co.nz/#!JRInRRSL!m3gYZ4yxP3soe8apj6F4O3-6dEhoo6bGDndnAQDlw-c)

Appreciate any help I can get... This bug has made my game unplayable and I have a feeling it's corrupted my save.
